quiz.title: Which Harry Potter Character Are You?
quiz.description: Answer the questions honestly to discover which Harry Potter character matches your personality.

questions.question: When faced with a difficult situation, what matters most to you?
options: Doing what's right, even if it's risky
Finding the most logical and well-planned solution
Standing by the people I care about
Understanding the deeper meaning behind the situation

questions.question: How do you usually handle rules?
options: Rules exist for a reason and should be followed
Rules are useful, but can be broken for a good cause
Rules apply differently depending on who you are

questions.question: If someone you dislike needs help, what do you do?
options: Help them anyway â€” it's the right thing
Help, but only if it makes sense logically
Help in an unexpected or unconventional way

questions.question: How do you usually make important decisions?
options: By discussing it with people I trust
By choosing what benefits me the most

questions.question: In a group, you are usually:
options: The emotional support of the group

questions.question: How do people usually describe you?
When you're under pressure, you:
options: Act quickly, even if it's risky
Stay calm and think it through

questions.question: Which flaw do you struggle with the most?
If you could be known for one thing, it would be:
Which Hogwarts house do you feel closest to?
If you had to sacrifice something important to protect others, would you?
options: Yes, but only after careful thought
Only if it benefited me too
